failure_to_meet_system_requirements:
Current Windows version does not meet the minimum requirements for Microsoft PC Manager: 
Windows 10 version 19042 or Windows Server 2021
meet_system_requirements: Current system meets the minimum system requirements of Microsoft PC Manager
cannot_read_pcm_version: Failure To Load Microsoft PC Manager Version
pcm_beta_installed: Microsoft PC Manager Public Beta is installed, version number is
winget_not_installed: WinGet is not installed, please use other solutions.
winget_search_error: Error Searching For Microsoft PC Manager
winget_no_results_found: No results found, please try changing other sources.
winget_source_reset_needed: Failed to open source, if the issue persists, please manually try 'winget source reset --force' command, or check Internet connection.
winget_msstore_source_agreement:
The `msstore` source requires that you view the following agreements before using. 
Terms of Transaction: https://aka.ms/microsoft-store-terms-of-transaction 
The source requires the current machine's 2-letter geographic region to be sent to the backend service to function properly (ex. 'US').
ask_winget_msstore_source_agreement: Do you agree to all the source agreements terms?
disagree_winget_msstore_source_agreement: One or more of the source agreements were not agreed to. Operation cancelled. Please accept the source agreements or remove the corresponding sources.
